Class CanvasM

java.lang.Object
java.awt.Component
java.awt.Canvas
CanvasM
All Implemented Interfaces:
ImageObserver, MenuContainer, Serializable, Accessible
Direct Known Subclasses:
ShapeInterface
class CanvasM extends Canvas
Creates a canvas in which the art will be made

  • Constructor Details

    • CanvasM

      public CanvasM(Color startingColour, int sizeX, int sizeY)
      Constructor for the class
      Parameters:
      startingColour - Is used to set the starting colour of the canvas
      sizeX - is the starting X size of the canvas
      sizeY - is the starting Y size of the canvas

  • Method Details

    • paint

      public void paint(int x, int y, Color c, int xSize, int ySize, boolean movement, int dash, Boolean press, String brushType)
      Paints a line upon the canvas
      Parameters:
      x - The x position of the shape
      y - The y position of the shape
      c - The colour of the line/shape to draw
      xSize - The x size of the shape to draw, also used for width for stuff like line width
      ySize - The x size of the shape to draw
      movement - Used to determine a line is being drawn or a dot clicked
      dash - The sieze of the dash gap used, if set to zero there will be no dash
      press - Checks to see if the mouse action is a press or click and if press does not draw without movement
      brushType - The type of brush the user wishes to use

    • setLocation

      public void setLocation(int x, int y)
      Sets location of the image x and y varibles
      Overrides:
      setLocation in class Component
      Parameters:
      x - X coordinate to set too
      y - y coordinate to set too

    • addLayer

      public void addLayer(Layer layer)
      Adds a new layer to the layers stack
      Parameters:
      layer - The new layer to be added

    • fill

      public void fill(int x, int y, int fillColor, int startColor)
      Fill tool - fill a contained space with a spcific colour, if not contiaind will fill whole canvas
      Parameters:
      x - Starting x position of the fill tool, based off mouse position
      y - Starting y position of the fill too, based off mouse position
      fillColor - Colour to fill the space with
      startColor - Colour to be replaced

    • eyeDrop

      public void eyeDrop(int x, int y, Colour_Toolbox toolbox, Brush_Toolbox brushToolbox)
      EyeDrop tool - takes the colour of the clicked pixel and applies it to the brush
      Parameters:
      x - the X position of the mouse
      y - the Y position of the mouse
      toolbox - The Colour Toolbox through which setting the brushes colour is accessed
      brushToolbox - The Brush Toolbox through which the mode is changed

    • drawShape

      public void drawShape(MouseEvent e, String optionSelected, Color colour, int size)
      Draws shapes upon the canvas
      Parameters:
      e - takes the MouseEvent variable
      optionSelected - var that takes the string variable from Shape_PopWin class
      colour - The colour of the shape to be drawn
      size - the size of the shape you want it to be scaled

    • changeBackgroundColour

      public void changeBackgroundColour(Color backgroundColor)
      Chnages the background colour of the canvas
      Parameters:
      backgroundColor - The colour the canvas will be
